code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function NFTMintForm(){const[name,setName]=useState('');const[url,setUrl]=useState('');const[minted,setMinted]=useState(false);const mint=()=>{if(!name||!url){alert('Please provide both NFT name and image URL.');return;}alert("\uD83E\uDDEC Minting NFT:\nName: ".concat(name,"\nImage: ").concat(url));setMinted(true);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginTop:'2em'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uD83C\uDFA8 Mint a New NFT"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"NFT Name",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),style:{display:'block',marginBottom:'1rem',padding:'8px',width:'300px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Image URL",value:url,onChange:e=>setUrl(e.target.value),style:{display:'block',marginBottom:'1rem',padding:'8px',width:'300px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:mint,style:{padding:'10px 20px',backgroundColor:'#007bff',color:'white',border:'none',borderRadius:'5px',cursor:'pointer'},children:"Mint NFT"}),minted&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginTop:'2rem',border:'1px solid #ccc',padding:'1rem',width:'320px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"\u2705 Minted Preview"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:name})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:url,alt:name,style:{maxWidth:'100%'}})]})]});}export default NFTMintForm;
